messages.setup_required_text:
Game paths are not configured yet.
Please enter your settings.
messages.game_dir_not_detected: Unable to detect the Mewgenics installation.
messages.exe_not_found: Mewgenics.exe not found in the selected game directory.
messages.permission_denied_modlist:
Permission denied: Unable to write to modlist.txt.
Make sure the folder has write permissions.
messages.proton_warning_text:
You are running on Linux with a Windows .exe (Proton).

Mods outside the game directory may not work correctly.
It's recommended to keep mods in the game folder on Linux/Steam Deck.

Continue anyway?
messages.no_mods_text: No mods are enabled. Enable some mods first.
messages.launch_options_instructions:
Copy these launch options and paste them in Steam:
Right-click game → Properties → Launch Options

Note: On Linux/Proton/Steam Deck, keep mods in the game directory for best compatibility.
messages.export_bat_instructions:
The launch script has been saved. To use it with Steam:

1. Right-click Mewgenics in your Steam library
2. Select Properties → Launch Options
3. Paste the following line:
messages.export_bat_note:
Note: The batch file contains all your current mod settings.
Re-export if you change mods or settings.
messages.no_mods_to_sort: No mods are enabled to sort.
